name: The Spectacular Adventures of Dorito, Legendary Hero
name_original: The Spectacular Adventures of Dorito, Legendary Hero
description: This is a story about a young chip named Dorito living in a world full of bags of chips. He starts out in his home, a chip factory, which is a safe but boring place. His adventure quickly begins when he ends up leaving home to go on a journey to try to find his missing best friend. Along the way, he encounters a variety of situations that challenge his world view and force him to question his beliefs. Despite these experiences, Dorito's endless optimism carries him through each experience, regardless of how negative. Eventually, he ends up changing the world he lives in, hopefully for the better. At its heart, The Spectacular Adventures of Dorito is about a kid trying to find out where he, and his unique world view, fit into the greater scheme of things.  It is a story about how optimism, which no matter how naïve it seems to be, can be a powerful force of change.
